summary: Comment and response papers share 95%+ title similarity but are distinct documents - one is a comment, the other is the response to that comment

comment.title: Re: Cisplatin-Based Therapy for Elderly Patients With Locally Advanced Head and Neck Squamous Cell Carcinoma

response.title: RESPONSE: Re: Cisplatin-Based Therapy for Elderly Patients With Locally Advanced Head and Neck Squamous Cell Carcinoma

notes: Only difference is prefix 'RESPONSE:' (8 characters) vs rest of title (~100 characters). For citation graphs, these should be distinct.
